ModMetaData.name: [JP] Fertile Fields Makeover
ModMetaData.author: jptrrs
ModMetaData.description: v1.1.1 Everybody loves Rainbeau's Fertile Fields... but only for what's inside! I thought it deserved better looks, so that's what I did. This is a recoloring and retexture of its resources. I didn't touch the buildings or the UI, tough, as it seems to me they fit well within the rest of the game. Changes also extend to these other mods, if present: - Rainbeau's Concrete - dninemfive's Fertile Fields Dub's Hygiene Compat - N7Hunstman Ceramics
